patch.comment: update API file
patch.author: Natalie Ethell <naethell@microsoft.com>

patch.comment: update api file generated by api-extractor 7
patch.author: Natalie Ethell <naethell@microsoft.com>

patch.comment: Fix selector in a mergeStyleSets Readme example
patch.author: Ivan <ivan.dijan@gmail.com>

minor.comment: Some references to "process" have been removed to help with tree shaking.
minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>

patch.comment: Fix bug where multiple selectors in :global() would not be processed correctly
patch.author: Mark Polak <mark@thedutchies.com>

patch.comment: Allow :global to be used in more scenarios than just ":global(selector)"
patch.author: Mark Polak <mark@thedutchies.com>

patch.comment: Use CSS object-fit in the Image component in capable browsers
patch.author: Mathieu 'p01' Henri <mathieu@p01.org>

minor.comment: DevExp: get rid of const enum so the library is compatible with Typescript's isolatedModule compilation mode
minor.author: Kenneth Chau <kenotron@users.noreply.github.com>

minor.comment: `strokeLinecap` added to IRawStyles.
minor.author: brandonthomas <brandonthomas@users.noreply.github.com>

minor.comment: Fixes #6975: adds ability for mergestyles to handle commas in selectors
minor.author: Kenneth Chau <kenotron@users.noreply.github.com>

minor.comment: Add api-extractor.json
minor.author: kkjeer <kkjeer@wellesley.edu>

patch.comment: IRawStyleBase: Replace string type on display property with a more specific type of possible values.
patch.author: Vitalie Braga <vitaliebraga@gmail.com>

patch.comment: Added 'stretch' as valid value for justifyContent in IRawStyleBase.
patch.author: Humberto Makoto Morimoto Burgos <Humberto.Morimoto@microsoft.com>

patch.comment: Update api-extractor
patch.author: kkjeer <kkjeer@wellesley.edu>

patch.comment: IStyleSet: Now uses a form that works better in TS 2.8 and does not require TS 3.0 to work. Thanks [Nimelrian](https://github.com/Nimelrian)!
patch.author: Cliff Koh <cliff.koh@microsoft.com>

patch.comment: Adding css grid properties to fill out the spec
patch.author: Joe Day <joeday@microsoft.com>

minor.comment: Enable api-extractor task for merge-styles
minor.author: kkjeer <kkjeer@wellesley.edu>

patch.comment: Moving tslint/prettier dependencies
patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>

patch.comment: Prettier cleanup
patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>

patch.comment: Ignoring registering rules which are undefined.
patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>

patch.comment: Adding a version stamp file
patch.author: Kenneth Chau <kenotron@users.noreply.github.com>

minor.comment: Adding support for feature queries in selectors.
minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>

patch.comment: Added some missing styles. mix-blend-mode plus some padding-inline-*
patch.author: Manfred Nysted Berry <38347275+mberry73@users.noreply.github.com>
Cliff Koh <cliff.koh@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Improve a DX issue with IProcessedStyleSet typings. (issue #6124)

patch.author: Sebastian K <nimelriansc2@gmail.com>
patch.comment: The IProcessedStyleSet type now correctly infers the types of subComponentStyles properties.

patch.author: Patrik Husfloen <redoz@redoz.com>
patch.comment: Adds missing CSS property values for 'align-self' in `IRawStyle` type definition and corrects CSS property values for 'justify-self' in 'IRawStyle'

minor.author: redoz <redoz@redoz.com>
minor.comment: Adds support for 'justifySelf' which is needed to align items in CSS Grid.

minor.author: Cliff Koh <cliff.koh@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: Change IProcessedStyleSet typings to be easier to consume - subcomponentStyles is now always present so consumers do not have to check for presence even when it is fully expected that it is there.

patch.author: ht <41147089+tharshada@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: formatting change

minor.author: Jason Gore <jagore@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: Add resize rule to IRawStyleBase.

patch.author: Cliff Koh <cliff.koh@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: `mergeStyleSet` is able to take falsey values again and handle it correctly in all cases.

minor.author: Cliff Koh <cliff.koh@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: Add support for style functions and improve documentation/typings.

minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: Reverting the TypeScript bump, to un

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Refining the merge-styles fix from yesterday to check for ownerDocument changes, which is a more correct comparison to work around the Chrome "window not resetting" issue.

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: If the singleton `Stylesheet` instance originated from another window, reset the instance. Workaround for an unexplained Chrome issue where the singleton was still accessible after a page refresh.

patch.author: natalieethell <naethell@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Prettier fixes

minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: Minor changes to improve server side rendering.

patch.author: Mark Polak <mark@thedutchies.com>
patch.comment: Added Prettier

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Updating react typings.

major.comment: v6 release - see office-ui-fabric-react@6.1.0 for all up v6 release notes.

patch.author: Marius Tenn√∏e <mariust@outlook.com>
patch.comment: Added missing merge-styles background-size typing

minor.author: Jordan Janzen <jordancjanzen@gmail.com>
minor.comment: Add `animation` to `IRawStyleBase` for use in style sets.

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: merge-styles: `style` elements which are created on the fly now "bunch" together, avoiding unpredictability in specificity.

minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: Updating how keyframe classes are cached to aid with jest snapshot testing.

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Updating documentation.

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: mergeStyles: rules are now registered in separate styling objects, improving performance significantly.

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Removing module entry temporarily. (Will be added back in 6.0.)

minor.author: Jordan Janzen <jordancjanzen@gmail.com>
minor.comment: Add backgroundClip property definition.

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: mergeStyles: flipping RTL at runtime now resets the keys.

minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: Updating to webpack 4 for producting bundles. Adding appropriate `module` and `sideEffects` fl

minor.author: Christian Gonzalez <christianjordangonzalez@gmail.com>
minor.comment: Upgrade to TypeScript 2.7.2

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Adding test coverage for media queries.

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: mergeStyles: setting `fill-opacity` as unitless.

minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: mergeStyles: Adding support to register selectors globally. Use `:global(rule)` as the selector to ensure that the unique className is not prepended in the output. See merge-styles README.md for more details.

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Adjusting rtl flipping logic to be more resilient to invalid styling.

patch.author: Lambert Wang <lambert.ww@gmail.com>
patch.comment: [provideUnits] Add line-height to ignore

minor.author: Montse Lozano Dieck <malozano@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: Change maxHeight/maxFontSize to CSSPixelUnitRule (number and string)

patch.author: Trevor Gau <trevorsg@gmail.com>
patch.comment: Fix styles with undefined values being added to document (#3700)

minor.author: Jakob Werner <jaxxx_w@yahoo.com>
minor.comment: Added a setting to Stylesheet which allows overriding the default prefix

minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: Updated build to newest React version and typings. Updated tests and made various tweaks to the code to remove React warnings and keep Enzyme

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Fixing issues where child variables in selectors would not expand correctly. Also fixing a case where the same static class registered in two different sets will not show up multiple times in the result from `mergeStyleSets`.

minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: Adding `onInsertNode` callback and adjusting appendChild method for injecting styles to not cause flashes.

minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: Updating TypeScript to 2.6.2.

minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: Adding the ability to append style content rather than inject using insertRule, for special cases.

patch.author: stephenzsy <stephen.zsy@gmail.com>
patch.comment: When selectors use previously registered class names as values, they are now correctly auto expanded.

minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: Adding `stroke` css property to typings.

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Calling `mergeStyles` with strings containing space delimited class names was not expanding merge-styles generated class names in the final merge. Fixed so that it does.

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: mergeStyles: in RTL we were seeing exceptions with registering opacity: 0 in keyframes. This has been addressed and a test has been added to cover the case.

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Adding data-merge-styles attribute to the style element so that it can be uniquely identified.

minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: Fixes to support media queries.

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Adding data-merge-styles attribute to the style element so that it can be uniquely identified.

patch.author: Christian Gonzalez <christianjordangonzalez@gmail.com>
patch.comment: Add test for autoexpand

patch.author: Jon Schectman <joschect@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: TSConfig: update to use preserveConstEnums so that certain builds s ystems don't break when importing const enums

minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: Adding selector support to target child class names that were generated in the same mergeStyleSets set.

minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: Found that adding `false` to the list of accepted typings in `mergeStyleSets` was breaking type safety. Removed it.

minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: The `mergeStyleSets` method's type safety was not correct. Now with significantly better type safety.
